name: Bach Duong Hotel
address: 369 Xuan Khanh, Son Tay, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Offering a restaurant, Bach Duong Hotel is located in Hanoi just 500 metres from Tam My market and 2 km from Ba Vi. The hotel offers elegant rooms where views of the mountain can be enjoyed. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and slippers. Extras include a minibar, a seating area and cable channels.

At Bach Duong Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered include a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including fishing. Bach Duong Hotel's restaurant serves Asian dishes.

The hotel is located 43 km from Hanoi Capital and 3 km from Son Tay Ancient Citadel. Noi Bai International Airport is situated a 1.5-hour drive away, while Ba Vi national park is 1 km from the hotel. The property offers free parking.
